publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-7654 Richard Lochhead: The Prohibited Procedures on Protected Animals (Exemptions) (Scotland) Amendment Regulations 2011—That the Rural Affairs and Environment Committee recommends that the Prohibited Procedures on Protected Animals (Exemptions) (Scotland) Amendment Regulations 2011 be approved. Supported by: Roseanna Cunningham*
